item.title: By: Frank Foodie
item.dc:creator: Frank Foodie
item.description: I think this is a great recipe and your marshmallows look different than the ones I see in the store. These marshmallows look more dense and not as fluffy.
item.content:encoded: I think this is a great recipe and your marshmallows look different than the ones I see in the store. These marshmallows look more dense and not as fluffy.

item.title: By: FFichiban
item.dc:creator: FFichiban
item.description: Marshmallows and chocolate... BRILLIANT!! Hee hee I should go make some mousse and watch Nigella dvds!
item.content:encoded: Marshmallows and chocolate… BRILLIANT!! Hee hee I should go make some mousse and watch Nigella dvds!

item.title: By: Sophia
item.dc:creator: Sophia
item.description: Lorraine ALWAYS have the best recipes. Your mousse is solid (maybe not THAT solid) proof of that with its creamy, soft, yet firmness! yUM!
item.content:encoded: Lorraine ALWAYS have the best recipes. Your mousse is solid (maybe not THAT solid) proof of that with its creamy, soft, yet firmness! yUM!

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: oh yum, it looks so fluffy and nice. Never thought of using marshmallow instead of egg, although I have a feeling it would be very sweet. Is it overly sweet?
item.content:encoded: oh yum, it looks so fluffy and nice. Never thought of using marshmallow instead of egg, although I have a feeling it would be very sweet. Is it overly sweet?

item.title: By: Sophie
item.dc:creator: Sophie
item.description:
I just love Nigella's never to fail recipes!! Your dessert looks attractive & so tasty!!
MMMMMMMMMMMMM,...
item.content:encoded:
I just love Nigella’s never to fail recipes!! Your dessert looks attractive & so tasty!!

item.title: By: Southern Grace gourmet
item.dc:creator: Southern Grace gourmet
item.description: Looks very easy, I will have to try this, I like the addition of marshmallows.
item.content:encoded: Looks very easy, I will have to try this, I like the addition of marshmallows.

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: Ohh mousse made with marshmallows....sounds good!

item.title: By: Betty
item.dc:creator: Betty
item.description: This sounds great! Never heard of the marshmallows being used before! Cool... I could eat that whole bowl right now!!
item.content:encoded: This sounds great! Never heard of the marshmallows being used before! Cool… I could eat that whole bowl right now!!

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: Fascinating recipe! Although, if you are worried about raw eggs you can: (1) use pasteurized egg whites: (2) make mousse with just chocolate and whipped cream; or (3) make mousse with even just cocoa, sugar and whipped cream (mostly nice for frosting because it is not as rich as mousse with melted chocolate, but you just can't beat the ease of preparation!).
item.content:encoded: Fascinating recipe! Although, if you are worried about raw eggs you can: (1) use pasteurized egg whites: (2) make mousse with just chocolate and whipped cream; or (3) make mousse with even just cocoa, sugar and whipped cream (mostly nice for frosting because it is not as rich as mousse with melted chocolate, but you just can’t beat the ease of preparation!).

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Fluffy chocolate mousse is such a good dessert! It's cool to hear you can get the texture with marshmallow rather than egg, especially with your second fluffy success.
item.content:encoded: Fluffy chocolate mousse is such a good dessert! It’s cool to hear you can get the texture with marshmallow rather than egg, especially with your second fluffy success.
